description: Christian tells Alexander the scoop, and Alexander has a chat with Benny (Lucas exclusive Ben Andrews) before casting him in his first scene as Ben Hardwick! Ben plays "whose is bigger" in the scene opposite a hot model (Derrick Hanson), who drops his ruler in shock at Ben's massive endowment. The crew is in shock as Ben uses his tool to give Derrick a good drilling and a new porn super-stud is born!
title: Ben Andrews and Derrick Hanson
